source.author: Conn, B.J.
source.title: Loganiaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Conn, B.J. (1999). Loganiaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Flowers on pedicels to 10 mm long (rarely longer; to 15 mm long in fruit); calyx externally more or less evenly pilose, rarely glabrous, lobes glabrous on inner surface
Flowers on pedicels (8–) 15–65 mm long; calyx externally glabrous or with very few hairs at base of notch between lobes, lobes sparsely hairy on inner surface
